text: The Untochables is an American crime drama television series that run on ABC from 15 October 1959 and 21 May 1963 and was distributed by Desilu Productions. It stars Robert Stack, Abel Fernandez, Nicholas Georgiade, Paul Picerni, Steve London, Anthony George, Keenan Wynn, Ed Asner, Barbara Stanwyck, Robert Bice, Frank Wilcox, Barbara Nichols, Dane Clark, Raymond Bailey and was two Primetime Emmys in the shows run. It was made into a movie The Untochables in 1987. ==Other websites== * *Encyclopedia of Television *Episode Broadcast Dates Category:1959 television series debuts Category:1963 television series endings Category:American crime drama television series Category:English-language television programs
title: The Untouchables (1959 TV series)
